name: The Elegant Abbey
description:
DESCRIPTION
Do you dream of offering the weddings of your dreams through time? The old Cistercian Abbey going through no less than 9 centuries of French history is for you. In a green and exotic setting, come lose yourself in the 12 hectares of the estate and its buildings of the sixteenth century.
You can stay directly at the chateau which is beautiful and elegant with 18th century style which included bed and breakfast during your stay. Welcoming 26 people, composed of 14 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms or shower rooms there is plenty of room for your close family and friends to stay on site. The estate also has a little cottage for 6 people with 2 bedrooms which includes a fully equipped kitchen.
For the main reception let yourself be guided to the magnificent François vaulted room which has a capacity of 120 guests or the magnificent 300 m2 bamboo tent with dance floor for a meal of up to 250 people.
Privatise the premises for your wedding and if you would like to entrust the complete organisation of your event with the team of wedding organisers of the Abbey then we would be more than happy to help. Whatever your choice, enjoy your day in peace and serenity! You can also bring your own wine with no corkage charges as we appreciate that everyone has different tastes and we want you to enjoy your big day with as much bubbly as you wish!
This location is a small historical treasure is located 1h30 from Paris. Easy to access and yet cut off from the world, recreating its quiet and epic universe, this castle is full of beautiful stories that you make your big day so special.
additional_info:
